changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE tokens ( id BIGSERIAL NOT NULL UNIQUE, user_id BIGSERIAL NOT NULL, token CHAR(36) NOT NULL UNIQUE, type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, used BOOLEAN NOT NULL, expire_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(id) );
